summary: Email correspondence between Jill Greenfield, a partner at Fieldfisher law firm, and an unnamed recipient regarding a client who wishes to speak about the Epstein investigation. The email discusses logistics for a discussion, mentions a team handling the investigation, and notes travel restrictions due to Covid-19.

persons.name: Jill Greenfield
persons.context: Author of the emails, communicating on behalf of a client who wishes to speak to the recipient about the Epstein investigation. She facilitates the discussion logistics.

events.title: Email discussion about Epstein investigation
events.description: Jill Greenfield emails an unnamed recipient to arrange a discussion for her client to ask questions about how the recipient would manage the Epstein investigation.

locations: London EC4R 3TT, United Kingdom (Fieldfisher office at Riverbank House, 2 Swan Lane)
keyFacts: A client of Jill Greenfield at Fieldfisher law firm wishes to speak to an investigator about the Epstein case to understand how they would manage it.
The investigation team has been updated and includes individuals with extensive experience in these types of cases.
Government foreign travel for the investigators is currently prohibited due to Covid-19, preventing an in-person meeting.
The correspondence is part of ongoing assistance in connection with the Epstein investigation.
